title: NFL Coaching Changes & Fantasy Impact, It’s Birthday Time - Fantasy Football Podcast for 3/3
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a special episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason break down the big NFL coaching changes ahead of the 2022 season. Which new coaches can have a real positive or negative impact on fantasy players?! Don’t miss this important offseason episode! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for March 3rd, 2022.

The 2022 UDK is available for pre-order at UltimateDraftKit.com -- Get instant access to the Dynasty Pass with the UDK+

(04:15) - NFL News
(11:15) - Coaching Changes
(14:45) - Chicago Bears
(20:20) - Denver Broncos
(24:10) - Houston Texans
(27:10) - Jacksonville Jaguars
(30:55) - Las Vegas Raiders
(36:30) - Miami Dolphins
(41:00) - Minnesota Vikings
(44:50) - New Orleans Saints
(51:30) - New York Giants
(55:05) - Buffalo Bills
(55:40) - Carolina Panthers
(57:00) - Detroit Lions
(57:45) - Green Bay Packers, Los Angeles Rams
(58:55) - Free Agency Wishes (Melvin Gordon, D’Ernest Johnson, Mike Williams, Allen Robinson)

Connect with the show:
Subscribe on YouTube
Visit us on the Web
Support the Show
Follow on Twitter
Follow on Instagram
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
